A comic strip series featuring the dog as the main character, using his unique ability to draw to solve mysteries and overcome challenges.
A children's book series that teaches the importance of creativity and imagination through the story of a dog who discovers his love for drawing.
A mobile game where players take on the role of the dog, using his drawing skills to create their own characters and complete challenges.
A short film that showcases the dog's talent for drawing and his journey to becoming a famous artist.
A podcast series where the dog shares his insights and experiences as an artist, as well as interviews with other animal artists and art enthusiasts.
